title: Sound On: Voting Reform, Powell Confirmation Hearing

description:
Guests: Republican Congressman French Hill of Arkansas, Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.
